headline: Campbell’s Completes Sale of noosa Business to Lakeview Farms
summary: CAMDEN, N.J., February 24, 2025--The Campbell’s Company (NASDAQ:CPB) (Campbell’s) today announced it has completed the sale of the noosa yoghurt business to Lakeview Farms, LLC, a manufacturer of fresh dips, desserts and specialty products. Terms of the transaction were not disclosed. Lakeview Farms and noosa will combine and now be known as Novus Foods.
